description:
Description
A simulated data set containing sales of child car seats at
400 different stores.
title: Sales of Child Car Seats

parameters.US:
A factor with levels No and Yes to
indicate whether the store is in the US or not
parameters.Sales: Unit sales (in thousands) at each location
parameters.CompPrice: Price charged by competitor at each location
parameters.Income: Community income level (in thousands of dollars)
parameters.Urban:
A factor with levels No and Yes to
indicate whether the store is in an urban or rural location
parameters.Advertising:
Local advertising budget for company at
each location (in thousands of dollars)
parameters.ShelveLoc:
A factor with levels Bad, Good
and Medium indicating the quality of the shelving location
for the car seats at each site
parameters.Price: Price company charges for car seats at each site
parameters.Age: Average age of the local population

format: A data frame with 400 observations on the following 11 variables.
